price: خامخا به يې داسې ځاى ته ننباسي چې هغوى ورباندې خوښ شي او الله خامخا ډېر پوه زغم والا دى.
arabic: لَيُدۡخِلَنَّهُم مُّدۡخَلٗا يَرۡضَوۡنَهُۥۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلِيمٌ حَلِيمٞ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: layud'khilannahum mud'khalan yarḍawnahu wa-inna al-laha laʿalīmun ḥalīmun
